title: A profile in atheist courage
author: VD
content_html:
In which Assistant Professor Myers boldly makes use of the trash bin:

I have to admit, I am surprised… it only took him two weeks to summon up the nerve to take on a cracker. But now that he’s found his courage, how about that radio debate, PZ?

UPDATE: PZ writes: “I’m really not at all interested in anything that loon Vox Day has to say…so there’s no point to forwarding his gibberings to me.”

I’ll just point out that I’m not the one bravely posting the contents of my garbage can on the Internet. And it’s such a pity that we won’t have any more of his keen and discerning commentary on my columns to anticipate in the future….
